title: Folio stand
credit_line: Gift of the following, by exchange: Elizabeth Braun Ernst; Barbara Ackerman, James Berkman, Richard Berkman, Helen Habbert, and Susan Rahm; Mrs. Paul B. Ernst; Mr. and Mrs. Frederic L. Cook; and Baroness Cassel Van Doorn
provenance_text:
H. Blairman and Sons, Ltd., London, March 2011–present
Sold privately by Christie’s Amsterdam to Martin Levy of H. Blairman and Sons, 
Ltd.
Offered by Christie’s Amsterdam, March 22–23, 2011, lot 477.
Sold by Christie’s, New York for R. F. North Trust, April 20, 2006, lot 12.
Acquired by R. F. North, 1929.
The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, Bequest of Miss Ada Augusta Draper, 1888.
